data.name: Wordeous - Basics Pack I
data.detailed_description: Did you played all the words which comes with the starter pack again and again? Do you want to play more? Unlock 500 new words with this Basics Pack! By buying this pack you will have access to 500 new words in "BASICS" category in addition to the starter pack words. This Basics Pack will give you hours of gameplay. New words, new possibilities!
data.about_the_game: Did you played all the words which comes with the starter pack again and again? Do you want to play more? Unlock 500 new words with this Basics Pack! By buying this pack you will have access to 500 new words in "BASICS" category in addition to the starter pack words. This Basics Pack will give you hours of gameplay. New words, new possibilities!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 @ 2.2GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+ @ 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Mx110 | AMD Radeon 520
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 or Intel i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Mx230 | AMD Radeon Vega 10
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
